title: Educational Curriculum for Understanding Cellular Concepts for Visually Impaired Students

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of life sciences, special education experience
context.additional_context: Science curriculum competency enhancement program specialized for visually impaired students

learning_goals: Explain basic cell structures and functions using 3D tactile models and audio descriptions
Accurately distinguish differences between animal and plant cells with over 80% precision using hands-on manipulatives
Develop cell education materials for visually impaired children following accessibility design principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
